amendment.description: Amendment amends the Clean Water Act to reauthorize the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Joyce amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 18 (Roll no. 569).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Joyce.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Joyce amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 18 (Roll no. 569).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
